notifyChanged().Description: Should be called when the data of this @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ has changed.

setEntries(java.lang.CharSequence[]).Description: Sets the human-readable entries to be shown in the list. This will be shown in subsequent dialogs. Each entry must have a corresponding index in @B_android#support#v7#preference#ListPreference#setEntryValues_E@.

Returns: The custom @B_android#widget#ArrayAdapter_E@ that needs to be used with this class.
createAdapter().Description: By default, this class uses a simple @B_android#widget#ArrayAdapter_E@. But if you need a more complicated @B_android#widget#ArrayAdapter_E@, this method can be overridden to create a custom one. Note: This method is called from the constructor. So, overridden methods will get called before any subclass initialization.

Parameters: int: The index of the value to set.
setValueIndex(int).Description: Sets the value to the given index from the entry values.

onClick().Description: Processes a click on the preference. This includes saving the value to the @B_android#content#SharedPreferences_E@. However, the overridden method should call @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference#callChangeListener_E@ to make sure the client wants to update the preference's state with the new value.

ClassDesc: A version of @B_android#support#v7#preference#ListPreference_E@ that presents the options in a drop down menu rather than a dialog.
